channel.title: admin on Academic
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Academic

item.description: I am a M.Sc. Student of Computational Visualistics at the University of Koblenz-Landau, currently working on my master thesis about hybrid ray tracing using C++ and Vulkan. I am passionate about all things rendering, be it ray tracing, rasterization, visualization. Other interests and skills include computer vision/image processing, 3D math and general programming, using mainly C++. Welcome to my portfolio page, where you can find everything about my projects, my skills and my education.
